experience.title: experience
experience.description: I am Shilpa Mishra, a passionate Front-end Developer, AI Enthusiast, and Web Security Learner with expertise in AI, Cybersecurity, Web Development, Cloud Computing, and Blockchain. With a Bachelor's in Computer Science & Engineering, I have built projects ranging from AI-powered Resume Screeners and Chat-bots to Cybersecurity tools like Phishing Detection and Network Monitoring. My skills extend to Web & Software Development, Cloud Deployment, and Game Development, focusing on scalable, innovative, and secure applications. Constantly exploring new technologies, I strive to solve real-world challenges and create impactful solutions. ðŸš€

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Programming & Development: Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Node.js, Flask, Django
AI & Machine Learning: NLP, Deep Learning, TensorFlow, OpenCV
Cybersecurity: Ethical Hacking, Network Security, Phishing Detection
Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD
Blockchain & Web3: Ethereum, Smart Contracts, Solidity
Data Science: Data Analysis, Time Series Forecasting, SQL, Pandas, Matplotlib

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Problem-Solving: Ability to tackle complex challenges with structured solutions.
Team Collaboration: Effective communicator and team player in agile environments.
Adaptability: Quick learner, always exploring new technologies.
Critical Thinking: Analytical approach to debugging and optimizing solutions.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About Me
I am an AI and Web Development enthusiast with a strong foundation in Cybersecurity and Cloud Computing. My journey in tech has been fueled by a passion for solving real-world problems with innovative solutions. I love building AI-powered applications, securing digital platforms, and optimizing cloud-based infrastructures. Constantly learning, I stay ahead of trends and work on projects that make an impact.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: My interests span AI, cybersecurity, web development, and blockchain. I enjoy working on projects that integrate AI into everyday applications, enhancing automation and efficiency. Beyond tech, I am passionate about problem-solving, exploring new advancements, and contributing to the open-source community.

education.title: education
education.description: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science & Engineering, where I gained expertise in AI, Web Development, Cybersecurity, and Cloud Computing. My academic background, coupled with hands-on projects, has equipped me with the skills to build scalable and secure applications.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: I enjoy staying active through sports like badminton and table tennis. These activities help me stay focused and energized for problem-solving in tech.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: I love playing strategy and puzzle games, which enhance my analytical thinking skills. Some of my favorites include Chess, Sudoku, and multiplayer coding challenges.

1.title: _Customer-Churn-Prediction
1.description: Predicts whether telecom customers will stay, leave, or join using demographic and service-related data. Enhances customer retention strategies.

2.title: _Breast-Cancer-Detection
2.description: Deep learning-based model for classifying histopathological images into benign or malignant categories using CNNs.

3.title: _AI-Powered-Resume-Screening
3.description: Automatically parses and categorizes resumes, recommending jobs based on content using machine learning for smart hiring.

4.title: _Password-Strength-Tester-&-Cracker
4.description: Java tool that evaluates password strength and simulates brute-force attacks for cybersecurity awareness and education.

5.title: _Phishing-Website-Detection
5.description: Detects phishing websites using machine learning classification models trained on URL features and HTML patterns.

6.title: _Real-Time-Network-Traffic-Analyzer
6.description: Real-time network packet analyzer with visual dashboards, filtering, Excel export, and cross-platform compatibility.

7.title: _AI-Chatbot-with-ChatGPT-API
7.description: A conversational AI chatbot integrated with the ChatGPT API for interactive, context-aware user support.

8.title: _Stock-Market-Forecasting
8.description: Uses Stacked LSTM networks to predict stock prices based on historical trends for smarter financial decisions.

9.title: _Object-Detection-App
9.description: Real-time object detection using TensorFlowâ€™s COCO-SSD model integrated into a React app.

10.title: _Predict-Future-Sales
10.description: Time-series forecasting of product sales using XGBoost and regression models, based on Kaggleâ€™s competition dataset.

11.title: _Sorting-Visualizer
11.description: Visual tool to demonstrate sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Merge Sort, and Quick Sort in action.

12.title: _Path-Finding-Visualizer
12.description: Interactive visualization of pathfinding algorithms such as A*, Dijkstra, and BFS with grid-based animation.
